Welcome to trailBlazer!
This app was created to help Orienteers navigate, and to make the whole orienteering experience smoother. 
Once you have made an account with us, you can browse courses near you that have been set up by event organisers. 
 Each marker on the course browser map represents a course. The marker colour represents the difficulty of that course.The difficulties range from: 
Green : Easy 
Blue : Intermediate 
Red : Hard 
Once you have selected a course, a compass will be displayed along with the starting location of the course you have selected. You can begin your journey once you are within the starting zone. 
Once you have started a course, the instruction for the first waypoint will be displayed, which you must navigate to! 
The next button allows you to move on to the next instruction for the next waypoint only when you have reached the waypoint you are currently being instructed to find. 
You will also have access to a course map that the course orgainser will have uploaded. 
When you have reached all waypoints around the course, your time will be uploaded to the Leader Board screen, which you can view once you have finished. 
Please take care when participating in a course!
